summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North and West Seventieth Street, in the City of Seattle, from Greenwood Avenue to Eighth Avenue Northwest, by constructing concrete sidewalks therein, together with all necessary crosswalks and surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1612 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
